articles.author: Matthew Hughes
articles.title: Quebec’s electricity deal with cryptocurrency miners makes sense
articles.description: Earlier today, Le Journal de Montreal reported that the Quebecois government will lift its ban on the sale of electricity to cryptocurrency miners, which has been in place since March, 2018. Instead, Quebec is looking for a more measured relationship with the mining companies that have fled to Canada’s second-most populous province in search of […]
